title: The Magic Hands EP
description:
This is three studio tracks from Australian band The Magic Hands. <a href="
http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Magic-Hands/21311197600" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Magic-Hands/21311197600</a>

The tracks are:
01 - Sprung
02 - Stoney Ground
03 - Zero Gravity

They play a particularly Australian flavour of indie synth-rock and have been steadily gaining support since they started playing live shows.

According to the band:
Coming to you from the dark corners of non-space, The Magic Hands exploded onto the Canberra music scene at the start of this year as a sign of something new and fresh. A combination of explosive live performances and a heap of interest saw The Magic Hands record their April Demo. The three tracks providing a dynamic sonic adventure combining solid rhythms and deep driving hooks fuelled by a combustible energy.

That\&#039;s perhaps a little over the top, but I\&#039;ll let the music speak for itself.

This torrent is brought to you with permission from the band, download it, stick it on your ipod and make sure everyone you know hears it at least four times. If you like these guys show them your support by keeping this torrent alive and letting people know about them!

 - SoS
